analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Maggārammaṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa.
analyzed: magga ārammaṇam hetum dhammam paṭicca na magga ārammaṇaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañcatisa ārammaṇe chabbīsa pe avigate pañcatisa

original: Maggārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā chabbīsa …pe… avigate chabbīsa.
analyzed: magga ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na magga hetukaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā chabbīsa pe avigate chabbīsa
